rule.title: Healing Potion
rule.line: A healing potion is a vial of ruby-red liquid that imparts a tingling sensation as the drinker's wounds heal rapidly. When you drink a healing potion, you regain the listed number of Hit Points.

rule.title: Hide Armor
rule.line: A mix of furs, sturdy hide, and sometimes molded boiled leather, this armor provides protection due to its layers of leather, though its bulkiness slows the wearer down and decreases mobility.

variant.line: Magic wards deflect attacks. Increase the armor's item bonus to AC by 1. The armor can be etched with a property rune.
Resilient runes imbue armor with additional protective magic. This grants the wearer a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

This rune counters burning and corrosive agents. Armor with this rune reduces the DC of the flat check to end persistent acid or fire damage affecting you from 15 to 12 (from 10 to 7 with particularly effective assistance).

rule.title: Nidhraug
rule.line: This large axe is too heavy to wield with one hand. Many greataxes incorporate two blades, and they are often "bearded", having a hook at the bottom to increase the strength of their chopping power.
rule.traittext: SweepThis weapon makes wide sweeping or spinning attacks, maknig it easier to attack multiple enemies. When you attack with this weapon, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll if you already attempted to attack a different target this turn using this weapon.

variant.line: Magical enhancements make this weapon strike true. Attack rolls with this weapon gain a +2 item bonus, and the weapon can be etched with two property runes.
A striking rune stores destructive magic in the weapon, increasing the weapon damage dice it deals to two instead of one.
When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes frightened 1.

A dragon bane rune allows you to deal more damage to dragons. The weapon deals 1d8 additional damage of the weapon's damage type a creature with the dragon trait. On a critical hit, the creature also takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage.
The benefit doesn't apply against dragons disguised as other creature types, and it's up to the GM whether a dragon bane rune applies against a creature disguised as a dragon.

rule.title: Trident
rule.line: This three-pronged, spear-like weapon typically has a 4-foot shaft. Like a spear, it can be wielded with one hand and thrown.

variant.line: Magical enhancements make this weapon strike true. Attack rolls with this weapon gain a +1 item bonus, and the weapon can be etched with one property rune.

rule.traittext: Thrown 20 ft.You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack, and it is a ranged weapon when thrown. A thrown weapon adds your Strength modifier to damage, just like a melee weapon does.

rule.title: Maul
rule.line: Mauls are massive warhammers that must be swung with two hands.
rule.traittext: ShoveYou can use this weapon to Shove with the Athletics skill even if you don’t have a free hand. This uses the weapon’s reach (if different from your own) and adds the weapon’s item bonus to attack rolls as an item bonus to the Athletics check. If you critically fail a check to Shove using the weapon, you can drop the weapon to take the effects of a failure instead of a critical failure.

variant.line: Magical enhancements make this weapon strike true. Attack rolls with this weapon gain a +1 item bonus, and the weapon can be etched with one property rune.
A striking rune stores destructive magic in the weapon, increasing the weapon damage dice it deals to two instead of one.

rule.title: Piki's Dagger
rule.line: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.
rule.traittext: AgileThe multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack is -4 instead of -5, and -8 instead of -10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.
FinesseYou can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.
Thrown 10 ft.You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack, and it is a ranged weapon when thrown. A thrown weapon adds your Strength modifier to damage, just like a melee weapon does.
Versatile SA versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than that listed in the Damage entry. You choose the damage type each time you make an attack.

variant.line: This weapon has been plated in silver, making it more effective against some creatures.

rule.title: Composite Longbow
rule.line: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted.
Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.
rule.traittext: Deadly d10On a critical hit, the weapon adds a weapon damage die of the listed size. Roll this after doubling the weapon’s damage. This increases to two dice if the weapon has a greater striking rune and three dice if the weapon has a major striking rune. An ability that changes the size of the weapon’s normal damage dice doesn’t change the size of its deadly die.
PropulsiveYou add half your Strength modifier (if positive) to damage rolls with a propulsive ranged weapon. If you have a negative Strength modifier, you add your full Strength modifier instead.
Volley 30ft.This ranged weapon is less effective at close distances. Your attacks against targets that are at a distance within the range listed take a –2 penalty.

variant.line: Magical enhancements make this weapon strike true. Attack rolls with this weapon gain a +1 item bonus, and the weapon can be etched with one property rune.

rule.title: Lifting Belt
rule.line: This wide leather belt grants you a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks and increases the amount you can easily carry. You can carry Bulk equal to 6 + your Strength modifier before becoming encumbered, and you can hoold and carry a total Bulk up to 11 + your Strength modifier.

block.name: Assisted Lift
block.part: Effect You lift an object of up to 8 Bulk as though it were weightless. This requires two hands, and if the object is locked or otherwise held in place, you can attempt to Force it Open using Athletics as part of this activation.
The object still has its full weight and Bulk for all other purposes—you just ignore that weight. The effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

rule.title: Boots of Bounding
rule.line: The springy soles of these sturdy leather boots cushion your feet and make each step lighter. These boots give you a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed and a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to High Jump and Long Jump.
In addition, when you use the Leap action, you can move 5 feet further if jumping horizontally or 3 feet higher if jumping vertically.

rule.title: Adventurer's Pack
rule.line: This is the starter kit for an adventurer, containing the essential items for exploration and survival.
The pack contains the following items: backpack (containing the other goods), bedroll, 10 pieces of chalk, flint and steel, 50 feet of rope, 2 weeks' rations, soap, 5 torches, and a waterskin.

variant.line: A backpack holds up to 4 Bulk of items, and the first 2 Bulk of these items don't count against your Bulk limits. If you're carrying or stowing the pack rather than wearing it, its Bulk is light instead of negligible and the Bulk reduction does not apply.

rule.title: Everyneed Pack
rule.line: Constructed of green material and decorated with a white Glyph of the Open Road, an everyneed pack has a dozen or more small pockets lning the inside. The pack is enchanted so that each pocket contains common, mundane gear, each item worth no more than 1 gp, such as chalk, flint and steel, and string. It doesn't contain any armor, shields, weapons, or items made of precious material.
Keep track of the exact value of the gear you retrieve from the pack. The pack becomes a mundane backpack after items of your choice with a combined value of 8 gp have been removed from it.

block.name: Activate
block.part: EffectYou draw any number of pieces of mundane gear from the pack with a combined value of 1 gp or less.
